channel.title: Cheap USB drive, give to computer idiots
channel.description:
NOTE--This is short, a joke to give someone, and so forth.
Ok, what you do is first get a normal sized USB drive shell, a USB extension cord. Next get some scissors(hate the stupid spelling) and cut off the cord from the end(which is the type that can go into the computer port) about 3 cm.(i'm american btw(i hate the system here)) then open up the shell of the USB drive(without making it look like you opened it) and stick it in, then superglue it into the end on the inside of the shell. Afterwards close it up, and give to an idiot who knows just about nothing about computers. Here should be your end-result. [img]http://keznews.com/pics/jokeware/cheap_usb_key.jpg[/img]
Note, I made the TuT on how to make it, but the idea came from [url=http://keznews.com/2169_Cheapest_USB_key]here.[/url]

@kloplop321 wrote:

not my pic though, remember, i did not do this for reals. although, i could with mine… but… i wouldn’t want to.

item.title: Cheap USB drive, give to computer idiots
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:9, topic:54564”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=77077.msg859465#msg859465 date=1170538006]

It’s a USB drive, not a USP drive.

I actually think USP means something, like he meant to do it.

Maybe “Universal Serial Plugin”? Just a thought.
[/quote]
USB = Universal Serial Bus
USP = Uninterruptible Signal Processing[/quote]

  /\

dont do it to this guy he knows
what hes talking about =)

Read full topic

[/quote]

I actually think USP means something, like he meant to do it.

USB = Universal Serial Bus
USP = Uninterruptible Signal Processing
